All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    CalculatorFragment
    Functionality to control the Calculator UI fragment.
    CalculatorViewModel
    Manages the state of the app for the user interface.
    CustomDieFragment
    UNIMPLEMENTED: Manages the state for creating and saving Custom Dice.
    CustomDieViewModel
    A ViewModel to manage the state and business logic of creating, editing and deleting a custom die.
    DiceCrunchApplication
    The main entry point for the application.
    DiceCrunchDatabase
    The ORM class to manage persistence.
    DiceCrunchDatabase.Converters  
    DiceTrayFragment
    Functionality to control the Dice Tray UI fragment.
    Die
    Database entity corresponding to the Die table.
    DieDao
    Data access object for the ORM to manage the Die entity.
    DieRepository
    A repository to manage persistence for the Die entity and database table.
    DieRoll
    Represent the result of a single die being rolled.
    DieWithFaces
    Plain Old Java Object (POJO) representing the relationship between the Die and Face tables.
    DieWithFormulas
    Plain Old Java Object (POJO) representing the relationship between the Die and Formula tables.
    Face
    Database entity corresponding to the Face table.
    FaceDao
    Data access object for the ORM to manage the Face entity.
    FaceWithDie
    Plain Old Java Object (POJO) representing the relationship between the Face and Die tables.
    Formula
    Database entity corresponding to the Formula table.
    FormulaDao
    Data access object for the ORM to manage the Formula entity.
    FormulaWithDie
    Plain Old Java Object (POJO) representing the relationship between the Formula and Die tables.
    GoogleSignInService
    Singleton service class to handle business logic of Google Sign In.
    History
    Database entity corresponding to the History table.
    HistoryAdapter
    Manages populating the scrollable history of dice rolls.
    HistoryAdapter.RerollHandler  
    HistoryDao
    Data access object for the ORM to manage the History entity.
    HistoryFragment
    Functionality to control the History UI fragment.
    HistoryRepository
    A repository to manage persistence for the History entity and database table.
    LoginActivity
    Provides Google Sign In logic.
    MainActivity
    The main controller to set up the Navigation menu, and the Options menu.
    Operand
    An operand used in dice rolling expression formulas.
    Operator
    A representation of an operator, useful for parsing and evaluating a dice formula expression.
    Parser  
    ScalarOperand
    A scalar representation of an operand.
    SettingsFragment
    Fragment to create the Settings screen.
    VectorOperand
    An operand consisting of vector data to represent the result of rolling multiple dice at the same time.
